content.body: does anyone know of any languages or frameworks that have coverage analysis of values instead of lines? like say you have `fn add(a, b) { ... }`, just calling `add()` in a test wouldn't be enough, you need to actually observe the returned value in an assertion like `assert add(1, 2) == 3` or something...
content.formatted_body: does anyone know of any languages or frameworks that have coverage analysis of values instead of lines? like say you have fn add(a, b) { ... }, just calling add() in a test wouldn't be enough, you need to actually observe the returned value in an assertion like assert add(1, 2) == 3 or something...
